EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1324339707.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Sounds good; that’s the right number.
Steve
From: davefeller@comcast.net [mailto:davefeller@comcast.net] Sent: Monday, December 19, 2011 7:08 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Thanks Steve, That works, I will call you at 11am. I am assuming this number (703.793.6011). Talk to you then, Dave. On Dec 19, 2011, at 1:53 PM, Steve Arhancet wrote:
Dave,
Look forward to speaking with you. How about Tuesday at 11am EST?
Steve
From: davefeller@comcast.net [mailto:davefeller@comcast.net] Sent: Monday, December 19, 2011 10:13 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Hi Steve, It does not seem like it has been 6 months. Believe it or not this project is still being considered and has moved to another level. I am also looking a possible second project. I would be interested in touching base with you for a few minutes tomorrow. I have a meeting on Wednesday and have a few questions for you. Do you have time for a phone call on Tuesday 12/19. My schedule is fairly flexible.
Let me know.
Thanks, Dave Feller
On Jun 27, 2011, at 12:44 PM, Steve Arhancet wrote:
Dave,
Thanks for the update. I’ll keep my fingers crossed for you and us J
I’ll follow up with you in 3 weeks.
Steve
From: davefeller@comcast.net [mailto:davefeller@comcast.net] Sent: Monday, June 27, 2011 12:29 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Hi Steve,
Thanks for the followup. The project we discussed is still under review for approval. I would give about a 50/50 chance of going through in it's current form. If this funding source does not go through there are secondary sources being considered. i do have some additional questions. However, I want to wait for the project to advance before we spend more time. I will keep you informed.
Thank you for taking the time to clarify your services. It has been helpful in formulating the best approach to this project.
Regards,
Dave. On Jun 22, 2011, at 9:02 AM, Steve Arhancet wrote:
Dave,
As promised, I wanted to follow up with you regarding your enrollment with MBO Partners. Any update would be great and if there are any additional questions that I can answer, please let me know or schedule a time with me.
Regards,
Steve
Steven Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment and Market Development O:703.793.6011 | M:540.560.8837 | F:703.793.6081 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive #300 Herndon, VA 20171 sarhancet@mbopartners.com www.mbopartners.com
